entry.content:
At my age, or any age for that matter, I'm sure people will say it's silly to believe in signs from the Universe, God, or however you want to call it. I believe and follow of them since I was a child. As long as my intuition and heart was in aligned, I always, always follow them.

Of course with time, I learnt that it didn't mean it was going to be a good thing, nor even a bad thing. But it'd be a path that you needed to take in order to learn, or fail to learn, a lesson.

I have made so many great mistakes. I have hurt people deeply. I've been hurt by people deeply. I regret none of it. Some of them became my best friends. Some other, never came back. That's alright. I didn't mean to hurt them and I know they didn't mean to hurt me. That's just the way it is and I'm ok with the logic behind.

And evidently it is intertwined with my romantic way of being. Both are silly beliefs I won't deny that. I love that part of me, though. 

I just hope one day she, whoever she is, if there is any, can beat my crazy by doing something crazy herself.

Thus then, I will tell her thank you, I love you.

entry.title: I Believe In Love
entry.summary: There is probably lots of people who believe that. But in my life on Earth, she is the first person I heard to say that. I also believe such thing but I kept it to myself because I've heard people critize other people about it…
entry.content:
There is probably lots of people who believe that. But in my life on Earth, she is the first person I heard to say that. I also believe such thing but I kept it to myself because I've heard people critize other people about it and I got scared. I didn't want to be rejected. I was only a child.

After so many years, I can say it without feeling bad. Hearing her uttering those words vibed so deep in me that it broke me out of my self-constructed shell. After all, it was me who put me there not people's criticism.

Is such thing silly? I will assume it is but I rather live in believing such thing. I have dwelled in other philosophies and I just can't keep doing that. 

When I was a child I was such a hopeless romantic and silly. My grandma understood that. She was my best friend. I saw Life with such awe and she did too.

Why did I let society to mold me? Anyway, it is over.

I believe in Love.
